newsitem.title: USA: Gantos July same store sales fall 23 pct.
newsitem.headline: Gantos July same store sales fall 23 pct.

text.p: Gantos Inc said Wednesday its net sales for the four-week period ended August 2 totaled $8.8 million, down 22 percent from a year earlier, with net sales for stores open throughout both periods down 23 percent.
Net sales for the second quarter ended August 2 were $35.8 million, down 14 percent from the same period last year. Net sales for stores open throughout both periods decreased by 15 percent.

The specialty retailer of women's wear and accessories said its net sales for the 26 weeks ended August 2 were $81.3 million, a decrease of 12 percent from the same period a year ago. Net sales for stores open throughout both periods decreased by 13 percent, Gantos said.
